trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> objects.

A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> object contains a set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects that are typically used to define the columns of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>オブジェクトのセットを含む<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>の列の定義に通常使用されるオブジェクト、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> that defines the layout of data in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>は、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>内のデータのレイアウトを定義する、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>コントロール。

trans-unit.source: To receive notification of changes in the collection, monitor the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event that is inherited from <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: コレクション内の変更通知を受信するには、監視、<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>から継承されたイベント<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>です。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" /> class.
Removes all of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> objects from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" />.
The position to place the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> to insert.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> to the collection at the specified index.
This method creates a new item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> without replacing another item.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドで新しい項目を作成、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>別のアイテムを置き換える必要はありません。

trans-unit.source: To replace an item in the collection with a new item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 置き換えるには、コレクション内の項目を新しいアイテムで、使用、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A>メソッドです。

trans-unit.source: The original position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
The new position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
Changes the position of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> in the collection.
The event arguments.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.CollectionChanged" /> event when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" /> changes.
The position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> to remove.
Removes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" /> at the specified index.
The position at which the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> replaces the old <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> to place at the specified position.
Replaces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> that is at the specified index with another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
This method replaces a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> with a new column.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは内の列に置き換えて、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>新しい列を含むです。

trans-unit.source: To insert a new column without replacing another column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 別の列を置き換えることがなく、新しい列を挿入するには、使用、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A>メソッドです。
